tagline: Generic Deployment tool for Django that will support popular PaaS providers such as Heroku, Dotcloud, Stackato, OpenShift, Gondor
body:
The goal of django-deployer is to minimize the effort to deploy a Django app to any of the popular PaaS providers. By asking a series of questions about the Django app, we can generate a generic deploy.yml file that can be consumed by any of the PaaS providers. Each PaaS provider can translate these requirements into a configuration that will work to deploy to their PaaS.

### PaaS providers

Here are instructions from each PaaS provider for how to deploy Django to their PaaS:

* [Heroku](https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/django)
* [DotCloud](http://docs.dotcloud.com/0.4/tutorials/python/django/)
* [Gondor.io](https://gondor.io/support/django/setup/)
* [OpenShift](https://github.com/openshift/django-example)
* [Stackato](http://docs.stackato.com/deploy/languages/python/django.html)
* [Amazon Elastic Beanstalk](http://aws.typepad.com/aws/2012/08/announcing-aws-elastic-beanstalk-support-for-python-and-seamless-database-integration.html)
* [Google App Engine](https://developers.google.com/appengine/docs/python/cloud-sql/django)


### Development

If you want to contribute to django-deployer, here is how you can check it out. More complete instructions coming soon...

```
$ git clone git://github.com/natea/django-deployer.git
$ cd django-deployer
$ ...
```

### Authors and Contributors
This project was born at the DjangoCon 2012 sprint by @natea and @johnthedebs with input from Jacob Kaplan Moss (@jacobian), Andrew Godwin from ep.io, Gabriel and Ken Cochrane from @DotCloud, Kenneth Reitz from @Heroku and Diane Mueller from @ActiveState.

### Support or Contact
We'd love to get input for how to best push this project forward. If you represent a PaaS provider and would like to contribute, submit a pull request or contact @natea with suggestions for making it better.

### Resources

This is not a new problem. A collection of other deployment tools that we found when researching this project:

* https://github.com/duointeractive/django-fabtastic
* https://github.com/gcollazo/Fabulous
* https://github.com/reverie/django-fabfile
* https://github.com/tswicegood/django-on-vagrant
* https://github.com/webengineer/django-fabfile
* https://github.com/alexisbellido/The-Django-gunicorn-fabfile-project
* https://github.com/akumria/django-paas
* http://bits.btubbs.com/silk-deployment
